Description:
Write “clean”, well-designed code.
Utilize appropriate resources to develop efficient PHP modules that can be used again for various applications.
Collaborate with the company's professionals to plan and implement a streamlined PHP application lifecycle.
Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality.
Examine the client requirements for adding the required features to the existing software or application.
Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges.
A PHP ecommerce web developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining ecommerce websites using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. They collaborate with clients or project managers to understand requirements and create functional and visually appealing online stores. They integrate payment gateways, implement security measures, optimize website performance, and troubleshoot issues. Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and knowledge of ecommerce principles are essential for this role.
Front end: html,css,bootstrap Back end: php or any framework related to php Database: MYSql ,MS Sql Graphic designing: Photoshop, illustrator Additional Skills: C#, Crystal reportSkills
Skills:
Proven software development experience in PHP.
In-depth knowledge of website technologies like frameworks, databases, HTML, browsers, and protocols.
Proficient in using third-party application programming interfaces offered by renowned companies like Facebook, Google, or Twitter.
Skilled developer well-versed in research and utilization of the latest PHP knowledge.
Exhibiting a phenomenal grasp of OOP concepts and the practical utility to develop simple and ergonomic digital applications.
degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject.
